Main pronunciation 主要发音: zhé

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning sides of chariot were weapons.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 浅尝輒止 qiǎn cháng zhé zhǐ (stop striving after obtaining a little knowledge about something)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 車兩輢也從車耴聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 輒 mutant 輙 from cart (车)車 chē and (rem- 取 qǔ) from related phonetic long-ear 𦔮 zhé C747 輒<輙> simp 辄.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- fenders or gunnels of a chariot)

Variant rule clarification :

輙字的基本解释

輙
zhé
同“辄”。

輙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］
［《廣韻》陟葉切，入葉，知。］
亦作“輙1”。“辄1”的繁体字。
(1)车耳。
(2)擅自；专擅。
(3)不动，静。参见“輒然”。
(4)足疾。
(5)系。参见“輒囊”。
(6)副词。每每；总是。
(7)副词。立即，就。
(8)副词。反而；却。
(9)承接连词。犹则。
(10)姓。汉有辄终古。见汉应劭《风俗通·佚文·姓氏》。

輙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輙； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1244第16
俗輒字。

輙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輙字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
輙
zhé
Same as "Noir".
輙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhé］
["Guangyun" Zhiye cuts, enters the leaves, knows. ]
Also known as "輙1". "辄1" in traditional characters.
(1) Car ears.
(2) Unauthorized; expert.
(3) Do not move, be still. See "Norran".
(4) Foot disease.
(5) Department. See "Noir sac".
(6) Adverbs. Every time; always.
(7) Adverbs. Immediately, just.
(8) Adverbs. Instead; however.
(9) Continuing conjunctions. Juze.
(10) Last name. The Han Dynasty has a long history. See Han Yingshao's "Fun Sutong · Lost Wen · Surname".
